Activity: Check emails and system notifications. Review the bug backlog and prioritize bug fixes based on severity and impact.
Verify bug fixes from previous builds. Retest bugs reported as fixed to ensure issues have been resolved and no new issues have been introduced.
Execute test cases focused on audio and sound effects. Document any issues with sound levels, missing sounds, or incorrect audio cues. @AUD-1 Need support on audio issues.
Conduct gameplay experience testing. Evaluate game balance, difficulty, and overall enjoyment. Provide feedback on areas that need improvement.
Perform soak tests by leaving the game running for extended periods. Monitor system resources and identify any memory leaks or stability issues.
Conduct ad-hoc testing, focusing on story elements and narrative design. Look for inconsistencies, plot holes, or dialogue errors. @NDES-1 I need to discuss the narrative design.
Document and report any critical bugs that impact the core gameplay experience. Escalate these bugs to the lead programmer and producer.
Summarize testing progress. Prepare a daily report outlining the number of test cases executed, the number of bugs found, and any significant observations.
